tickets.title: Optimize page load speed
tickets.body: The website's load time is currently higher than acceptable standards. Please optimize images, reduce the size of CSS and JavaScript files, and consider implementing lazy loading for media content.

comments.text: Please ensure the changes don't affect the layout.

tickets.title: Add user feedback form
tickets.body: Implement a feedback form on the website where users can submit their comments and suggestions. Ensure that the form is easy to use and that feedback is securely stored for review.

tickets.title: Update Terms of Service
tickets.body: The Terms of Service need to be updated to reflect new company policies. Please update the document on the website and ensure that all users are notified of the changes.

comments.text: Terms have been updated and published.

tickets.title: Improve accessibility features
tickets.body: The website should be more accessible to users with disabilities. Implement features such as screen reader compatibility, keyboard navigation, and alternative text for images.

tickets.title: Fix broken links
tickets.body: Several links on the website are currently broken or lead to incorrect pages. Please audit the site and update or remove these links to improve user experience.

comments.text: Identified 15 broken links, working on fixes.
Identified 15 broken links, working on fixes.

tickets.title: Enhance site security
tickets.body: Recent audits have highlighted some security vulnerabilities. Please prioritize implementing stronger encryption, updating outdated libraries, and adding additional security measures to protect user data.

tickets.title: Add new blog section
tickets.body: Create a new blog section on the website to share company news, updates, and industry insights. The section should be easy to navigate and integrated with the existing design.

comments.text: Design mockups for the blog section are ready.

tickets.title: Redesign contact page
tickets.body: The contact page needs a redesign to improve usability and visual appeal. Consider adding a map, a contact form, and social media links.

tickets.title: Implement dark mode
tickets.body: Add a dark mode option to the website. Ensure the feature is toggleable and that all elements are correctly styled in dark mode.

comments.text: Initial dark mode prototype is ready for review.

tickets.title: Localize website content
tickets.body: Translate the website content into Spanish and French. Ensure that all pages are accurately translated and culturally appropriate.

comments.text: Spanish translation complete, working on French.
